summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsVeganCeraVe Hydrating Makeup Removing Plant-Based Wipes cleanses and removes makeup, even waterproof makeup, without disrupting the protective skin barrier. The 100% plant-based wipes are ultra-gentle on skin, eye area, lashes and are biodegradable in home compost.
details: DetailsBenefitsHydrating Makeup Remover Face WipespH balanced rinse-free face cleansing wipes remove dirt, oil, and makeup, including waterproof mascara. With ceramides and glycerin, the gentle cleansing wipes help lock in moisture.Plant Based Face ClothThe 100% plant based face cloth, infused with gentle makeup remover, is biodegradable in home compost.SENSITIVE SKIN TESTED & NON-GREASY FEELFormulated with sensitive skin in mind, the hydrating formula is fragrance-free, oil-free, allergy-tested, ophthalmologist-tested, sensitive skin-tested, and non-comedogenic so it will not clog your pores.3 ESSENTIAL CERAMIDESCeramides are found naturally in the skin and make up 50% of the lipids in the skin barrier. All CeraVe products are formulated with three essential ceramides (1, 3, 6-II) to help restore and maintain the skin's natural barrier.DERMATOLOGIST RECOMMENDEDCeraVe Skincare is developed with dermatologists and has products suitable for dry skin, sensitive skin, oily skin, acne-prone, and more.Formulated WithoutFragranceAlcoholOilItem 2591828How To UseGently wipe face with towelette, removing dirt, oil, and makeup. There is no need to rinse. Reseal pack after use. If product gets into eyes, rinse thoroughly with water.After use, place wipes into home compost to break down over time. Ensure that wipes do not contain non-biodegradable waste such as glitter or micro-beads. Wipes can make up to 10% of home compost.Do not dispose of wipes in the toilet or natural environment as biodegradable wipes need a properly maintained home compost pile to effectively break down.IngredientsAqua/Water/Eau, Isohexadecane, Isopropyl Myristate, Glycerin, Peg-7 Glyceryl Cocoate, Hexylene Glycol, Dicaprylyl Ether, Ceramide Np, Ceramide Ap, Ceramide Eop, Carbomer, Triethyl Citrate, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate, Cholesterol, Piroctone Olamine, Tocopherol, Hydroxyacetophenone, Caprylyl Glycol, Citric Acid, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Phytosphingosine, Xanthan Gum, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Benzoic Acid.
how_to_use: Gently wipe face with towelette, removing dirt, oil, and makeup. There is no need to rinse. Reseal pack after use. If product gets into eyes, rinse thoroughly with water.After use, place wipes into home compost to break down over time. Ensure that wipes do not contain non-biodegradable waste such as glitter or micro-beads. Wipes can make up to 10% of home compost.Do not dispose of wipes in the toilet or natural environment as biodegradable wipes need a properly maintained home compost pile to effectively break down.

reviews.headline: Not for sensitive skin
reviews.comments:
I used this to remove my makeup but it caused a burning sensation on my skin, red/irritated patches, and inflamed. I bought another pack in hopes that it'd be a different experience but no luck.

Def don't recommend for sensitive skin.

reviews.headline: They cause a burning sensation
reviews.comments: I have extremely dry and sensitive skin, and by the end of the day, my face is peeling around my nose and on my chin.  My physician recommended that I use only CeraVe products, including these wipes to start the cleansing process every night. They are excellent for removing makeup, however, I think they may have changed their formulation.  They are now causing a burning sensation, and my skin has become more dry and irritated.  I thought it was a fluke or a bad lot, so I purchased a different pack at another store, and the same thing happened.  Unfortunately, I will not be using these anymore.

reviews.headline: great hydrating wipes
reviews.comments: I love these and they score excellent on yuka! üòä I was thrilled to see that.

reviews.headline: Best on the market
reviews.comments: These wipes remove every trace of makeup and are extremely gentle.  Great to remove sunscreen as well.

reviews.headline: Cleans well
reviews.comments: Use these as part of my nightly routine to remove makeup. Leaves my skin nice and clean and not feeling dry.

reviews.headline: Best wipes I've used
reviews.comments: The wipes are high quality and hydrating.

reviews.headline: Amazing wipes
reviews.comments: This is the only brand  I use !

reviews.headline: Amazing wipes
reviews.comments: This is the only brand  I use !

reviews.headline: burned
reviews.comments: this burned my skin after using especially my eyelids and the wipes are never even damp

reviews.headline: These smell AWFUL!
reviews.comments:
I love CeraVe products and have used these wipes for a long time. Something recently changed because they have a strong smell, even though they are supposed to be fragrance free. I seriously have to hold my nose it's so bad. Otherwise, the wipes are good, which makes it really disappointing. They're large, work well and make your skin feel soft. The smell though..

Switching to Cetaphil, hopefully theirs doesn't smell terrible.

reviews.headline: Did they change the formula?
reviews.comments: I feel like they must have changed the formula. I used to like these, but they have a weird smell now. I wont purchase again.

reviews.headline: Dirty, opened seal.
reviews.comments: Package arrived with an open seal which was also brown all around it. I wasn't even able to even use as it was contaminated. Disappointed and wasted money.

reviews.headline: Dry
reviews.comments: Not moisturizing and the wipes arent ever even damp

reviews.headline: sensitive skin beware
reviews.comments: i love cera be, especially all of their hydrating cleaners, facial lotion, and eye repeat cream. however, this was awful. it burnt right after using. my roommate and i are 23, and this burnt her skin as well, but hers isn't sensitive!

reviews.headline: Didn't like them
reviews.comments: I bought this pack a day or two ago and I didn't notice a bad smell at all. Mine was very lightly scented. However, I didnt like them for other reasons. The wipe itself is like a thin smooth cloth, but because of that it didn't do well at removing makeup. I use minimal products so I was disappointed that it could barely remove that. They also felt slightly dry. Not really worth it in mt opinion because there are better options that are cheaper

reviews.headline: Awful Smell
reviews.comments: These wipes are really soft on the skin and work well at removing makeup but they have an awful smell! They smell like cow manure and it lingers on the skin afterwards. I thought I had a bad batch but looking at other reviews it seems that they might have changed the formula.

reviews.headline: awful smell
reviews.comments: These wipes smell like manure. They smell like cow poop on a farm. Which is unfortunate because they feel nice and soft on the skin and do a good job at removing makeup. I just can't get passed the smell, it even lingers on your skin.

reviews.headline: Great product, no problem with the smell
reviews.comments: I was reading other reviews and was surprised about the smell issue - the smell of these doesn't bother me at all, and I definitely don't get a fishy smell. Maybe its like cilantro ‚Ä¶ only some people are affected? Anyway, I like the wipes. They do a great job removing makeup (including waterproof mascara) without drying my skin. I like to take them camping and traveling as they're very convenient. Wish the packaging was a little better as the opener doesn't restick well, but it's definitely not a deal breaker.

reviews.headline: great product
reviews.comments: I think this is a great product.  I use it to remove my makeup, then wash with a cleanser.   This way I'm sure to get it all of

reviews.headline: Surprised by the size!
reviews.comments: These wipes are HUGE! I love it though because I was able to remove all my makeup with one wipes. My eyes did not burn and my mascara easily came off without me having to tug on my lashes. I was doubtful, but these are the real deal!

media.headline: Soft and pillowy makeup removing wipes!
media.caption: The wipes are now a part of my routine

faceoff_positive.comments: I love the idea of a plant based wipe that is biodegradable, much better than any other wipes I know of. CeraVe's plant based makeup wipe is a bit thin but if you're not too rough then it won't tear on you. I like that it's hydrating since I live in a dry area so that it doesn't strip my skin. It does also remove waterproof makeup with not too much effort. However I found that after wiping my eyes especially after a few times they were reacting like you would while cutting onions. I don't normally have any issues with wipes so I found it strange, but after a while it went away. I would say these work really well but as with most wipes this didn't get everything entirely. I used this same lines toner and it got everything left so I didn't have to fully wash my face if I didn't have time to after. But if you want your face truly clean then you'll have to wash it a little after or use toner. Overall I would still use these and just be a bit more gentle around the eyes.
faceoff_positive.headline: Wipe is a bit thin but still works.

faceoff_negative.comments:
As a beauty professional active for 20+ year's, I've tried a few facial wipes in my day. CeraVe came out with a very good product, especially for dryer skin types. 
It's a bigger facial wipe, other brands aren't as big. It had a weird odor to it, even though it's supposed to be scent free, it was enough to bother me which is why I only gave 3 stars. 
I love how soft and gentle the wipes are, they cleansed my skin great! These are dermatologist tested as well as developed by dermatologists. Very hydrating, my skin felt so fresh and clean after every use.
faceoff_negative.headline: Face feels fresh afterwards.
